title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: E-Guest Utilization Strategies for Online Synchronous Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain two or more real-world applications of mathematical theories through real-time discussions with e-guests
Learners can summarize key concepts in three steps by analyzing e-guests' presentation materials during synchronous sessions
Learners can present mathematical approaches to practical problems posed by e-guests at least twice and incorporate feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
